name: Send a Mocean SMS from a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
This template periodically checks for new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet and uses the retrieved information to send SMSes via Mocean.

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zGij3PQveP34e7A71ij0pMS-_ngOzPPft8JnYLMLajU/edit?pli=1#gid=0) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the source of the data. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
